content.p: As the Sports University of the Year for 2024 and top University in the UK for team sport, we offer an award-winning programme of sport, health and fitness opportunities for our students and community. Discover all you need to know about getting active on-campus with University of Nottingham Sport. From key information about our facilities, programmes and membership, click below to #FindYourActive! Keep up to date with all the latest news Combine your degree with practical skills We offer undergraduate and postgraduate courses Sports University of the Year 2024 Sports University of the Year 2024. The University of Nottingham has done the double – by being named Sports University of the Year by two influential national university league tables. Faculty of Arts As an archaeology student, you might be particularly excited about our practical facilities. Well, we don’t just have one laboratory. We have five! Student experience Home isn’t a place – it’s the feeling that you’re free to be whoever you want to be. And you’ve just found it. UON Nottingham’s Student Union is home to more than 300 societies and over 70 sports clubs, there’s something for everyone. Hear about NatSci Soc Nottingham has been crowned the best university in the UK for sports by The Times and The Sunday Times Good University Guide 2024, published today (Friday 15 September) – the third time the university has been awarded the accolade by the publication since 2018.
